description_notes: Victron MultiPlus-II 48/3000/35-50 (48V, 3kVA)
Sterling Power BB1248120 battery-to-battery charger (12V or 24V input to 48V output, ~1500W max, ~26A at 57.6V). Requires fused input/output paths per fuse schedule.
Victron Cerbo GX
Victron SmartShunt 300A
48V 100Ah LiFePO4 Golf Cart Lithium Battery (3x), 200A BMS low-temp protection, max 4 batteries = 400Ah system. Price basis: ~$539 each.
Temperature Sensor for Victron Energy Quattro, MultiPlus and GX Device (comes with multiplus)
Victron Energy Battery Switch ON/Off 275 amp
Victron Lynx Distributor M10 (LYN060102010)
Installed in Lynx Distributor: 125A (MultiPlus) x5, 60A (MPPT) x3, 40A (Sterling output) x3, 30A (Orion feeder) x3. Use 58V/80V-rated MEGA fuses only.
Sterling input: 150A + holder (12V side) x2. Orion 12V output to fuse panel: 60A + holder.

Fuse Block, 12v Fuse Box Holder with LED indicator and integrated negative bus (12V/24V). Use panel main + stud as 12V source-combine point and panel integrated negative bus/main - as shared return (no separate 12V negative busbar required).
Sterling Power BBR remote controller for BB1248120 current limiting and control
Starlink DC Power Supply
2x covered 600A+ busbars: 48V + busbar (combine after Class T fuses) and 48V - busbar (battery-only combine before SmartShunt). Reduces lug stacking on the disconnect and SmartShunt studs.
Purchased 2026-02-18: 200A Class T Fuse Kit TFB1-200 x3 (includes JLLN-200 200A Class T fuse x3 installed) plus JLLN-200 200A spare fuse x1. Purchase total: $229.96.
Victron Orion-Tr Smart DC-DC Converter - 48/12-Volt 30 amp 360-Watt - isolated. Primary 48V-to-12V converter feeding shared 12V bus with buffer battery support.
12V 100Ah LiFePO4 buffer battery for shared 12V bus support (transient smoothing and continuity for DC loads).
QWORK 4/0 Gauge Wire Cutter

2x 12V-fed USB PD station assemblies: office station (target includes 100W USB-C plus additional USB-A/C including one 65W port) and galley station (Powerwerks-style assorted USB-C/A including one 65W port).

2/0 AWG fine-strand OFC baseline (no padding): 61.5 ft total = 34.5 ft red + 27.0 ft black. Source circuits: C-01/C-02/C-02C/C-03/C-04/C-05/C-06/C-07/C-08/C-16/C-17. Includes strict equal-length 3x battery parallel branches. Add checkout overage separately.
6 AWG baseline (no padding): 22.5 ft total = 12.5 ft red + 10 ft black. Source circuits: C-09/C-10/C-11/C-12/C-13/C-14/C-15/C-18/C-19.
4 AWG baseline (no padding): 5 ft total = 2.5 ft red + 2.5 ft black. Source circuits: C-19A/C-19B (12V buffer battery path).

10 AWG pair-equivalent baseline for PV routing (no padding): 36 ft route total (~72 conductor-ft single-wire equivalent). Source circuit: C-27 (3x ~8 ft string legs + ~12 ft combiner-to-MPPT trunk, ASSUMED).
14 AWG duplex baseline (no padding): 44 ft total. Source circuits: C-20/C-21/C-22/C-23/C-35.
18/2 baseline usage (no padding): 18.5 ft total for C-24/C-25/C-26; practical purchase may require next spool size.
2/0 AWG × M10 (3/8 in stud): ~20–24 (3x battery bank + busbars + spares)
2/0 AWG × M8 (5/16 in stud): ~10–14 (battery posts + Lynx/MultiPlus + spares)

30A shore cord plus 30A-to-15A and 30A-to-20A dogbone adapters for mixed pedestal/household hookups.
Compact 4-6 space AC enclosure for shore-input disconnect and AC-out branch breaker layout (non-DIN acceptable).
Branch breakers for AC-out-1 distribution: 20A galley branch + 15A office branch + one spare position.
2x GFCI receptacles (first outlet on each AC-out-1 branch: galley + office). Use downstream feed-through protection where applicable.
2x duplex receptacles for downstream branch locations, giving 4 total receptacle locations with row 15 (2 galley, 2 office).
4x receptacle boxes + covers/faceplates + strain-relief/clamp hardware for final outlet install.
